entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except northwest 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
